issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Make MemoryStream public
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11276](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11276). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I found the need to take a copy of MemoryStream for use in another project.

It would be nice if we could expose this as a supported public API so that other projects building physical operators can re-use it.
